title: 190. Christian White: The Wife and The Widow
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary: Christian White chats to Dani Vee about his new book The Wife and Widow. Christian chats about feeling like a fraud, writing as a collaborative process, transparency about the writing process and earth drafts of his novel.
